summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Lionforce CMS Admin Panel and public pages. All backend APIs (17/17 tests passed) and frontend functionality working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Admin.js is 1200+ lines - consider splitting into smaller components for maintainability
useSiteContent.js has good fallback handling with deepMerge function
seed_data_creation: Created test contact form submissions and newsletter subscriptions during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All CMS functionality verified: Admin login, Dashboard stats, Edit Pages (Home/About/Contact/India Expansion/Global Settings), Images tab, Form Settings, Submissions, Subscribers. Public pages (Home, About, Contact) correctly fetch and display CMS content with fallbacks. Contact form submission works end-to-end.

features_tested.admin_dashboard: PASS - Shows correct stats (Contact Forms: 3, Subscribers: 1, Images: 0, Pages: 5)
features_tested.admin_edit_pages: PASS - Can navigate to Home, About, Contact, India Expansion, Global Settings
features_tested.admin_edit_content: PASS - Hero section fields (badge, title, subtitle) are editable
features_tested.admin_save_content: PASS - Save All button saves content to database
features_tested.homepage_cms_integration: PASS - Content saved in admin appears on public homepage
features_tested.about_page: PASS - Loads correctly with CMS integration
features_tested.contact_page: PASS - Loads correctly with CMS integration
features_tested.contact_form_submission: PASS - Form submits successfully with success message
features_tested.admin_images_tab: PASS - Image Library loads with Upload Image button
